overview: 'Dance with me' was originally conceived as part of a broader project called “A Disturbance Traveling Through A Medium” (2016, at Duve Gallery, Berlin)—which corresponds to the scientific definition for the term “wave.” The starting point for the overall spatial installation as well as for each single work is an imaginary future, in which aerospace is dominated by women, and in which data analysis and the affective relation to the cosmos merge.
title: Dance with me
